  <p> Leatherworker: <strong>Niriella of Kothian</strong>.  She has soft gentle features, glowing brown eyes and a missing tooth (<em>Alone</em>). <small>In the pocket: <strong>2 cp</strong>.</small>  <ul>      <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll_ex('FruxvRjo','RerollerQuest');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a>  Niriella's <strong>Husband</strong>, Sylvius, is missing since last month.    <h5> Foreshadowing </h5> <ul>  <li> It is impossible to hear anything inside. </li>   </ul>  <h5> Doorways </h5> <ul>  <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('8H8uSgXX');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <strong>W</strong> side - arched iron door (<strong>Half-broken</strong>)  </li>   <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('2gkzeNUh');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <strong>N</strong> side - rectangular wooden door (<strong>Barricaded</strong>)  </li>   <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('gO08HL3A');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <strong>S</strong> side - arched bronze door (<strong>Stuck</strong>)  </li>   <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('OaWOMZ7m');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <strong>E</strong> side - rectangular wooden door (<strong>Locked <span class='alchemy'>&#128838;</span></strong>)   <ul><li> The key was lost long time ago.</li> </ul>   </li>             </ul> <h5> Description </h5> <blockquote> This area was likely used as a pantry and the ceiling is slick with slime.  A strange sensation is creeping up your spine.  </blockquote> <ul>  <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('0jVLjFRi');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a>  <strong>Kelaith the Lich</strong> is inside this area.  It  will attack anyone stepping in.  <p> <strong>Lich</strong>   <hr/> <div id="block-PcikXSjf" class="monster-block"> <div class="statblock"> <div class="statblock-top-row"> <div><span class="section-label">CR:</span> 21 or 22 in lair (33000 XP)</div> <div><span class="section-label">AC:</span> 17 (natural armor)</div> <div><span class="section-label">HP:</span>  (18d8 + 54)</div> <div><span class="section-label">Speed:</span> Walk 30 ft.</div> </div> <table class="statblock-table"> <tr><th>STR</th><th>DEX</th><th>CON</th><th>INT</th><th>WIS</th><th>CHA</th></tr> <tr> <td>11 <small> +1 </small> </td> <td>16 <small> +3 </small> </td> <td>16 <small> +3 </small> </td> <td>20 <small> +5 </small> </td> <td>14 <small> +2 </small> </td> <td>16 <small> +3 </small> </td> </tr> </table> <div> <input class="monster-block-toggle" name="toggle-PcikXSjf" id="toggle-PcikXSjf" type="checkbox" onclick="javascript:document.getElementById('block-PcikXSjf').scrollIntoView();"/> <div id="block-toggle-PcikXSjf" class="statblock-container"> <ul>  <li><strong>Saving Throws: </strong> Con +10, Wis +9, Int +12</li>   <li><strong>Immunities: </strong> poison; bludgeoning, piercing and slashing from nonmagical attacks</li>   <li><strong>Senses: </strong> truesight 120 ft.</li>   <li><strong>Alignment: </strong> Lawful Neutral Chaotic Evil</li>   <li><strong>Languages: </strong> Common plus up to five other languages</li>  </ul>  <hr/> <div><ul> <li><strong>Legendary Resistance (3/Day):</strong> If the lich fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.</li><li><strong>Rejuvenation:</strong> If it has a phylactery, a destroyed lich gains a new body in <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d10' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d10');"><strong>1d10</strong></a> days, regaining all its hit points and becoming active again. The new body appears within 5 feet of the phylactery.</li><li><strong>Turn Resistance:</strong> The lich has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.</li> </ul></div>   <hr/> <h6>Actions</h6> <div><ul> <li><strong>Paralyzing Touch:</strong> <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d20+12' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d20+12');"><strong><strong>+12</strong></strong></a> to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. The target must succeed on a <strong>DC18</strong> Constitution saving throw or be <strong>paralyzed</strong> for 1 minute.    <h5> Foreshadowing </h5> <ul>  <li> It is impossible to hear anything inside. </li>   </ul>  <h5> Doorways </h5> <ul>  <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('RKyX58qG');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <strong>N</strong> side - arched wooden door (<strong>Stuck</strong>)  </li>   <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('MnH3fGC7');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <strong>S</strong> side - arched iron door (<strong>Stuck</strong>)  </li>   <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('0g5aSl1l');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <strong>E</strong> side - rectangular wooden door (<strong>Barricaded</strong>)  </li>   <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('pbFFhUMo');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <strong>W</strong> side - arched marble door (<strong>Barricaded</strong>)  </li>             </ul> <h5> Description </h5> <blockquote> A decorated ceremonial stone was placed here and the hidden alcoves have a few claw marks on them.  You feel the chill of death curling up your spine.  </blockquote> <ul>  <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('22KoLTxU');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a>   There are 7 Will-o'-Wisps  inside.   They  will attack anyone stepping in.  <p> <strong>Will-o'-Wisp</strong>   <hr/> <div id="block-QmDNCCJ0" class="monster-block"> <div class="statblock"> <div class="statblock-top-row"> <div><span class="section-label">CR:</span> 2 (450 XP)</div> <div><span class="section-label">AC:</span> 19</div> <div><span class="section-label">HP:</span>  (9d4)</div> <div><span class="section-label">Speed:</span> Walk 0 ft. Fly 50 ft. (hover)</div> </div> <table class="statblock-table"> <tr><th>STR</th><th>DEX</th><th>CON</th><th>INT</th><th>WIS</th><th>CHA</th></tr> <tr> <td>1 <small> -5 </small> </td> <td>28 <small> +9 </small> </td> <td>10 <small>  </small> </td> <td>13 <small> +2 </small> </td> <td>14 <small> +2 </small> </td> <td>11 <small> +1 </small> </td> </tr> </table> <div> <input class="monster-block-toggle" name="toggle-QmDNCCJ0" id="toggle-QmDNCCJ0" type="checkbox" onclick="javascript:document.getElementById('block-QmDNCCJ0').scrollIntoView();"/> <div id="block-toggle-QmDNCCJ0" class="statblock-container"> <ul>   <li><strong>Immunities: </strong> lightning and poison</li>   <li><strong>Senses: </strong> darkvision 120 ft.</li>   <li><strong>Alignment: </strong> Chaotic Evil</li>   <li><strong>Languages: </strong> the languages it knew in life</li>  </ul>  <hr/> <div><ul> <li><strong>Consume Life:</strong> As a bonus action, the will-o'-wisp can target one creature it can see within 5 feet of it that has 0 hit points and is still alive. The target must succeed on a <strong>DC10</strong> Constitution saving throw against this magic or die. If the target dies, the will-o'-wisp regains 10 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='3d6' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('3d6');"><strong>3d6</strong></a>) hit points.</li><li><strong>Ephemeral:</strong> The will-o'-wisp can't wear or carry anything.</li><li><strong>Incorporeal Movement:</strong> The will-o'-wisp can move through other creatures and objects as if they were TAG:quickref. It takes 5 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d10' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d10');"><strong>1d10</strong></a>) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.</li><li><strong>Variable Illumination:</strong> The will-o'-wisp sheds bright light in a 5 to 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional number of ft. equal to the chosen radius. The will-o'-wisp can alter the radius as a bonus action.</li> </ul></div>   <hr/> <h6>Actions</h6> <div><ul> <li><strong>Shock:</strong> <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d20+4' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d20+4');"><strong><strong>+4</strong></strong></a> to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Inflicts 9 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='2d8' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('2d8');"><strong>2d8</strong></a>) lightning damage.</li><li><strong>Invisibility:</strong> The will-o'-wisp and its light magically become <strong>invisible</strong> until it attacks or uses its Consume Life, or until its TAG:status ends (as if TAG:status on a spell).</li> </ul></div>  </div> </div> </div> </div>  <hr/> <ul>  <li><a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('OpCoweAR');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a>Monster Hoard: <ul> <li> <strong>163 gp</strong> in coins </li> <li><strong>50 gp worth of artifacts (25gp each):</strong> Copper chalice with silver filigree, Small gold bracelet</li> <li><strong>Magic Items:</strong> Goggles of night, Helm of comprehending languages, Potion of greater healing</li> </ul> </li>  </ul> </p> </li> <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('3p5Uv534');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> Several large decorative pillows can be found in an alcove. </li>  <li> Searching will uncover a cloth wrap under a stone holding the <strong>key (<span class='alchemy'>&#128778;</span>)</strong> to unlock <span class="spoiler" onmouseover="window.clearTimeout(this.spoilerTimeout);this.spoilerTimeout=window.setTimeout(() => {this.classList.add('revealed')},1000)" onmouseout="window.clearTimeout(this.spoilerTimeout);this.spoilerTimeout=window.setTimeout(() => {this.classList.remove('revealed')},1000)"> the rectangular wooden door (to the W) in <a href="/sandbox/nTR8nJOW/location/KnIkUBLf">area 13</a></span>  </li>   <li> There’s a <strong>pressure plate lever</strong> that can open the secret door in <a href="/sandbox/nTR8nJOW/location/OTWFMnjS">area 72</a> (to the E) </li>      </ul>

   <h5> Foreshadowing </h5> <ul>  <li> A few single silver pieces could be found if examining the ground near the entrances to this area. </li>   </ul>  <h5> Doorways </h5> <ul>  <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('Fzvr8k2k');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <strong>S</strong> side - arched bronze door (<strong>Trapped</strong>)  <ul><li> This doorway is magically trapped. When undetected using a <strong>DC18</strong> Wisdom (Perception, <small>passive or active</small>) check, it will trigger when crossing. Succeed a <strong>DC20</strong> Intelligence saving throw or <strong>forget</strong> how to cast one random spell for one day. </li> </ul>  </li>   <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('Nd840nRr');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <strong>W</strong> side - triangle wooden door (<strong>Half-broken</strong>)  </li>   <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('1ReBi8el');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <strong>N</strong> side - arched bronze door (<strong>Barricaded</strong>)  </li>   <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('Fzb5xTiY');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <strong>E</strong> side - arched marble door (<strong>Stuck</strong>)  </li>             </ul> <h5> Description </h5> <blockquote> It is dark and damp here and the hidden alcoves are covered with spots of yellow ooze.  There are some big jars near the far wall.  </blockquote> <ul>  <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('NORiXaCp');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> The jars are trapped. There's a small <strong>gas-filled</strong> vial made of an extremely fragile glass embedded in a handle. If undetected using a <strong>DC16</strong> Wisdom (Perception, <small>passive or active</small>) check, it will pop open. Succeed a <strong>DC20</strong> Constitution saving throw or sustain <strong><a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d6' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d6');"><strong>1d6</strong></a></strong> turns of uncontrolled spasms. </li><li>There’s a <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d6' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d6');"><strong>2-in-6</strong></a> chance the jars contain: <ul> <li> <strong>207 gp</strong> in coins </li> <li><strong>20 gp worth of gemstones (10gp each):</strong> <span title="opaque light blue-green">Turquoise</span>, <span title="transparent pale blue">Blue quartz</span></li>  </ul> Otherwise, this place was already looted earlier.  </li> <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('nuoxHV9Z');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> There’s also a pile of papers near the wall on the left and some carved figurines next to it. </li>  <li> Searching will uncover an old leather pouch holding the <strong>key (<span class='alchemy'>&#128770;</span>)</strong> to unlock <span class="spoiler" onmouseover="window.clearTimeout(this.spoilerTimeout);this.spoilerTimeout=window.setTimeout(() => {this.classList.add('revealed')},1000)" onmouseout="window.clearTimeout(this.spoilerTimeout);this.spoilerTimeout=window.setTimeout(() => {this.classList.remove('revealed')},1000)"> the arched bronze door (to the W) in <a href="/sandbox/nTR8nJOW/location/u97DC1pn">area 79</a></span>  </li>       </ul>

   <h5> Foreshadowing </h5> <ul>  <li> It is impossible to hear anything inside. </li>   </ul>  <h5> Doorways </h5> <ul>  <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('RQBj1y4v');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <strong>N</strong> side - round wooden door (<strong>Half-broken</strong>)  </li>   <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('f3BDisIR');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <strong>W</strong> side - arched wooden door (<strong>Half-broken</strong>)  </li>               </ul> <h5> Description </h5> <blockquote> This area is dark and cold and the floor has a few spots of green rot on it.  Something here makes the hair at the back of the neck stand.  </blockquote> <ul>  <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('8TdmIStt');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a>   There are 2 Wights  inside.   They  will attack anyone stepping in.  <p> <strong>Wight</strong>   <hr/> <div id="block-WN7txAUk" class="monster-block"> <div class="statblock"> <div class="statblock-top-row"> <div><span class="section-label">CR:</span> 3 (700 XP)</div> <div><span class="section-label">AC:</span> 14 (studded leather armor)</div> <div><span class="section-label">HP:</span>  (6d8 + 18)</div> <div><span class="section-label">Speed:</span> Walk 30 ft.</div> </div> <table class="statblock-table"> <tr><th>STR</th><th>DEX</th><th>CON</th><th>INT</th><th>WIS</th><th>CHA</th></tr> <tr> <td>15 <small> +3 </small> </td> <td>14 <small> +2 </small> </td> <td>16 <small> +3 </small> </td> <td>10 <small>  </small> </td> <td>13 <small> +2 </small> </td> <td>15 <small> +3 </small> </td> </tr> </table> <div> <input class="monster-block-toggle" name="toggle-WN7txAUk" id="toggle-WN7txAUk" type="checkbox" onclick="javascript:document.getElementById('block-WN7txAUk').scrollIntoView();"/> <div id="block-toggle-WN7txAUk" class="statblock-container"> <ul>   <li><strong>Immunities: </strong> poison</li>   <li><strong>Senses: </strong> darkvision 60 ft.</li>   <li><strong>Alignment: </strong> Neutral Evil</li>   <li><strong>Languages: </strong> the languages it knew in life</li>  </ul>  <hr/> <div><ul> <li><strong>Sunlight Sensitivity:</strong> While in sunlight, the wight has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (<strong>Perception</strong>) checks that rely on sight.</li> </ul></div>   <hr/> <h6>Actions</h6> <div><ul> <li><strong>Multiattack:</strong> The wight makes two longsword attacks or two longbow attacks. It can use its Life Drain in place of one longsword attack.</li><li><strong>Life Drain:</strong> <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d20+4' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d20+4');"><strong><strong>+4</strong></strong></a> to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. The target must succeed on a <strong>DC13</strong> Constitution saving throw or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0., A humanoid slain by this attack rises 24 hours later as a TAG:creature under the wight's control, unless the humanoid is restored to life or its body is destroyed. The wight can have no more than twelve zombies under its control at one time.</li><li><strong>Longsword:</strong> <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d20+4' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d20+4');"><strong><strong>+4</strong></strong></a> to hit, reach 5 ft., one target.    <h5> Foreshadowing </h5> <ul>  <li> It is impossible to hear anything inside. </li>   </ul>  <h5> Doorways </h5> <ul>  <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('gDziIDSd');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <strong>E</strong> side - round iron door (<strong>Stuck</strong>)  </li>       <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('cBEe62V5');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <strong>W</strong> side - secret door (requiring a <strong>passphrase</strong>)  <ul><li> If detected, one of the characters will uncontrollably gesture or act the word <strong>"Goblin"</strong>. <span class="spoiler" onmouseover="window.clearTimeout(this.spoilerTimeout);this.spoilerTimeout=window.setTimeout(() => {this.classList.add('revealed')},1000)" onmouseout="window.clearTimeout(this.spoilerTimeout);this.spoilerTimeout=window.setTimeout(() => {this.classList.remove('revealed')},1000)">The full passphrase is in <strong><a href="/sandbox/nTR8nJOW/location/pDvRJwLa">area 12</a></strong>.    <h5> Foreshadowing </h5> <ul>  <li> Traces of something heavy dragged on the ground could be found if examining around the entrances to this area. </li>   </ul>  <h5> Doorways </h5> <ul>  <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('KthBJMat');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <strong>S</strong> side - round wooden door (<strong>Half-broken</strong>)  </li>       <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('egcS1B8g');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <strong>N</strong> side - secret door (requiring a <strong>passphrase</strong>)  <ul><li> If detected, one of the characters will uncontrollably gesture or act the word <strong>"Forbidden"</strong>. <span class="spoiler" onmouseover="window.clearTimeout(this.spoilerTimeout);this.spoilerTimeout=window.setTimeout(() => {this.classList.add('revealed')},1000)" onmouseout="window.clearTimeout(this.spoilerTimeout);this.spoilerTimeout=window.setTimeout(() => {this.classList.remove('revealed')},1000)">The full passphrase is in <strong><a href="/sandbox/nTR8nJOW/location/7jGsHIA5">area 67</a></strong>. Gesture or mime the complete passphrase to open.</span>  </li></ul>  </li>       <li> <strong>W</strong> side - passage to area 45. </li>      </ul> <h5> Description </h5> <blockquote> Various cutting tools are hanging beside strips of linen and the entryway has a few spots of green rot on it.  There are some very big barrels near the far wall.  </blockquote> <ul>  <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('zwTEPD1C');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> The barrels are trapped. <strong>Loose</strong> stones are locked above the barrels, released when a <strong>switch</strong> hidden in a rim is triggered. When undetected using a <strong>DC15</strong> Wisdom (Perception, <small>passive or active</small>), it will drop down. Succeed in a <strong>DC15</strong> Dexterity saving throw or sustain <strong><a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d8' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d8');"><strong>1d8</strong></a> damage</strong>. </li><li>There’s a <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d6' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d6');"><strong>2-in-6</strong></a> chance the barrels contain: <ul> <li> <strong>257 gp</strong> in coins </li> <li><strong>550 gp worth of gemstones (50gp each):</strong> <span title="opaque bands of black and white, or pure black or white">Onyx</span>, 2 &times; <span title="opaque bands of red and white">Sardonyx</span>, <span title="opaque dark gray with red flecks">Bloodstone</span>, 2 &times; <span title="opaque orange to red-brown">Carnelian</span>, <span title="opaque white">Chalcedony</span>, <span title="translucent green">Chrysoprase</span>, <span title="transparent pale blue-green">Zircon</span>, 2 &times; <span title="transparent pale yellow-brown">Citrine</span></li> <li><strong>Magic Items:</strong> Potion of speed, Potion of supreme healing, Scroll<sup>8th</sup> of Animal Shapes <small>(Druid)</small>, Scroll<sup>8th</sup> of Incendiary Cloud <small>(Sorcerer, Wizard)</small></li> </ul> Otherwise, this place was already looted earlier.  </li> <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('1p1dXsgr');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> A broken music box can be found in the far corner. </li>  <li> Searching will uncover an old hollow torch holding the <strong>key (<span class='alchemy'>&#128851;</span>)</strong> to unlock <span class="spoiler" onmouseover="window.clearTimeout(this.spoilerTimeout);this.spoilerTimeout=window.setTimeout(() => {this.classList.add('revealed')},1000)" onmouseout="window.clearTimeout(this.spoilerTimeout);this.spoilerTimeout=window.setTimeout(() => {this.classList.remove('revealed')},1000)"> the rectangular wooden door (to the W) in <a href="/sandbox/nTR8nJOW/location/gszrNSBC">area 49</a></span>  </li>       </ul>

   <h5> Foreshadowing </h5> <ul>  <li> It is impossible to hear anything inside. </li>   </ul>  <h5> Doorways </h5> <ul>  <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('nSiFzlLP');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <strong>E</strong> side - round iron door (<strong>Barricaded</strong>)  </li>   <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('bEutLkCh');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <strong>W</strong> side - arched wooden door (<strong>Barricaded</strong>)  </li>           <li> <strong>N</strong> side - passage to area 71. </li>      </ul> <h5> Description </h5> <blockquote> Empty storage crates are thrown all over and the floor is covered with lichen growths. It  will attack anyone stepping in.  <p> <strong>Skeleton</strong>   <hr/> <div id="block-RYp3yxzx" class="monster-block"> <div class="statblock"> <div class="statblock-top-row"> <div><span class="section-label">CR:</span> 1/4 (50 XP)</div> <div><span class="section-label">AC:</span> 13 (armor scraps)</div> <div><span class="section-label">HP:</span>  (2d8 + 4)</div> <div><span class="section-label">Speed:</span> Walk 30 ft.</div> </div> <table class="statblock-table"> <tr><th>STR</th><th>DEX</th><th>CON</th><th>INT</th><th>WIS</th><th>CHA</th></tr> <tr> <td>10 <small>  </small> </td> <td>14 <small> +2 </small> </td> <td>15 <small> +3 </small> </td> <td>6 <small> -2 </small> </td> <td>8 <small> -1 </small> </td> <td>5 <small> -3 </small> </td> </tr> </table> <div> <input class="monster-block-toggle" name="toggle-RYp3yxzx" id="toggle-RYp3yxzx" type="checkbox" onclick="javascript:document.getElementById('block-RYp3yxzx').scrollIntoView();"/> <div id="block-toggle-RYp3yxzx" class="statblock-container"> <ul>   <li><strong>Immunities: </strong> poison</li>   <li><strong>Senses: </strong> darkvision 60 ft.</li>   <li><strong>Alignment: </strong> Lawful Evil</li>   <li><strong>Languages: </strong> understands all languages it spoke in life but can't speak</li>  </ul>   <hr/> <h6>Actions</h6> <div><ul> <li><strong>Shortsword:</strong> <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d20+4' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d20+4');"><strong><strong>+4</strong></strong></a> to hit, reach 5 ft., one target.    <h5> Foreshadowing </h5> <ul>  <li> It is impossible to hear anything inside. </li>   </ul>  <h5> Doorways </h5> <ul>  <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('t8VlKK4r');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <strong>W</strong> side - odd-shaped wooden door (<strong>Locked <span class='alchemy'>&#128846;</span></strong>)   <ul><li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('NxNJ8MZ1');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <span class="spoiler" onmouseover="window.clearTimeout(this.spoilerTimeout);this.spoilerTimeout=window.setTimeout(() => {this.classList.add('revealed')},1000)" onmouseout="window.clearTimeout(this.spoilerTimeout);this.spoilerTimeout=window.setTimeout(() => {this.classList.remove('revealed')},1000)">The key is in <a href="/sandbox/nTR8nJOW/location/pDvRJwLa"><strong>area 12</strong></a></span> </li> </ul>   </li>   <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('aXEjUvJX');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <strong>N</strong> side - triangle iron door (<strong>Half-broken</strong>)  </li>   <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('TDeTiMbS');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <strong>E</strong> side - rectangular marble door (<strong>Stuck</strong>)  </li>              </ul> <h5> Description </h5> <blockquote> It is dark and damp here and there are some fractures on the floor.  A strange sensation is creeping up your spine.  </blockquote> <ul>  <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('KdHofUb1');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a>  There’s a Vampire Spawn inside.  It  will attack anyone stepping in.  <p> <strong>Vampire Spawn</strong>   <hr/> <div id="block-8oypiD4g" class="monster-block"> <div class="statblock"> <div class="statblock-top-row"> <div><span class="section-label">CR:</span> 5 (1800 XP)</div> <div><span class="section-label">AC:</span> 15 (natural armor)</div> <div><span class="section-label">HP:</span>  (11d8 + 33)</div> <div><span class="section-label">Speed:</span> Walk 30 ft.</div> </div> <table class="statblock-table"> <tr><th>STR</th><th>DEX</th><th>CON</th><th>INT</th><th>WIS</th><th>CHA</th></tr> <tr> <td>16 <small> +3 </small> </td> <td>16 <small> +3 </small> </td> <td>16 <small> +3 </small> </td> <td>11 <small> +1 </small> </td> <td>10 <small>  </small> </td> <td>12 <small> +1 </small> </td> </tr> </table> <div> <input class="monster-block-toggle" name="toggle-8oypiD4g" id="toggle-8oypiD4g" type="checkbox" onclick="javascript:document.getElementById('block-8oypiD4g').scrollIntoView();"/> <div id="block-toggle-8oypiD4g" class="statblock-container"> <ul>  <li><strong>Saving Throws: </strong> Dex +6, Wis +3</li>    <li><strong>Senses: </strong> darkvision 60 ft.</li>   <li><strong>Alignment: </strong> Neutral Evil</li>   <li><strong>Languages: </strong> the languages it knew in life</li>  </ul>  <hr/> <div><ul> <li><strong>Regeneration:</strong> The vampire regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point and isn't in sunlight or running water. If the vampire takes radiant damage or damage from holy water, this trait doesn't function at the start of the vampire's next turn.</li><li><strong>Spider Climb:</strong> The vampire can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.</li><li><strong>Vampire Weaknesses:</strong> The vampire has the following flaws:, TAG:i The vampire can't enter a residence without an invitation from one of the occupants., TAG:i The vampire takes 20 acid damage when it ends its turn in running water., TAG:i The vampire is destroyed if a piercing weapon made of wood is driven into its heart while it is <strong>incapacitated</strong> in its resting place., TAG:i The vampire takes 20 radiant damage when it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.</li> </ul></div>   <hr/> <h6>Actions</h6> <div><ul> <li><strong>Multiattack:</strong> The vampire makes two attacks, only one of which can be a bite attack.</li><li><strong>Bite:</strong> <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d20+6' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d20+6');"><strong><strong>+6</strong></strong></a> to hit, reach 5 ft., one willing creature, or a creature that is <strong>grappled</strong> by the vampire, <strong>incapacitated</strong>, or <strong>restrained</strong>. Inflicts 6 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d6 + 3' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d6 + 3');"><strong>1d6 + 3</strong></a>) piercing damage plus 7 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='2d6' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('2d6');"><strong>2d6</strong></a>) necrotic damage. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken, and the vampire regains hit points equal to that amount.    <h5> Doorways </h5> <ul>  <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('CnETuizE');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <strong>N</strong> side - rectangular marble door (<strong>Trapped</strong>)  <ul><li> There's a concealed 10 foot deep pit next to the door. Succeed a <strong>DC20</strong> Dexterity saving throw or sustain <strong><a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d8' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d8');"><strong>1d8</strong></a> damage</strong>. </li> </ul>  </li>   <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('GystpvAc');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <strong>W</strong> side - rectangular wooden door (<strong>Locked <span class='alchemy'>&#128851;</span></strong>)   <ul><li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('Eg6dFDQf');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <span class="spoiler" onmouseover="window.clearTimeout(this.spoilerTimeout);this.spoilerTimeout=window.setTimeout(() => {this.classList.add('revealed')},1000)" onmouseout="window.clearTimeout(this.spoilerTimeout);this.spoilerTimeout=window.setTimeout(() => {this.classList.remove('revealed')},1000)">The key is in <a href="/sandbox/nTR8nJOW/location/WVcFoNdH"><strong>area 18</strong></a></span> </li> </ul>   </li>           <li> <strong>E</strong> side - passage to area 63. </li>      </ul> <h5> Description </h5> <blockquote> It is dark and damp here and the floor is covered with burn marks.    <h5> Foreshadowing </h5> <ul>   </li> <li> A successful listen roll will  also  reveal a faint <strong>sound of crying</strong> coming from inside this area. </li>   </ul>  <h5> Doorways </h5> <ul>  <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('BU8Xdn1S');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <strong>N</strong> side - rectangular wooden door (<strong>Barricaded</strong>)  </li>            <li> <strong>W</strong> side - passage to area 44. </li>      </ul> <h5> Description </h5> <blockquote> This place seems to be an old dungeon cell and the corner sides have several spots of green rot on them.    <h5> Doorways </h5> <ul>  <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('wpeVCgdw');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <strong>S</strong> side - round wooden door (<strong>Barricaded</strong>)  </li>   <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('iZBFxs0A');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <strong>W</strong> side - round bronze door (<strong>Half-broken</strong>)  </li>           <li> <strong>N</strong> side - passage to area 54. </li>      </ul> <h5> Description </h5> <blockquote> You hear the sound of water dripping down and the floor has some burn marks on it.    <h5> Doorways </h5> <ul>       <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('vhUEihJE');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <strong>S</strong> side - secret door (requiring a <strong>passphrase</strong>)  <ul><li> If detected, a gentle voice will sing <strong>"Eternal"</strong>. <span class="spoiler" onmouseover="window.clearTimeout(this.spoilerTimeout);this.spoilerTimeout=window.setTimeout(() => {this.classList.add('revealed')},1000)" onmouseout="window.clearTimeout(this.spoilerTimeout);this.spoilerTimeout=window.setTimeout(() => {this.classList.remove('revealed')},1000)">The full passphrase is in <strong><a href="/sandbox/nTR8nJOW/location/XfvFFvnq">area 43</a></strong>. Sing or use the phrase in a song to open.</span>  </li></ul>  </li>       <li> <strong>W</strong> side - passage to area 33. </li>      </ul> <h5> Description </h5> <blockquote> Countless creepy crawlies all over rush back into the darkness and there are some splatters of dark matter on the walls.  You spot something quite big lying on the floor.  </blockquote> <ul>  <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('QjYxXMgf');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> Lying on the floor is <strong>the dust covered skeleton of an orc</strong>.  Searching it will uncover: <ul> <li> <strong>45 gp</strong> in coins </li> <li><strong>90 gp worth of gemstones (10gp each):</strong> <span title="opaque black">Obsidian</span>, 2 &times; <span title="opaque light and dark blue with yellow flecks">Lapis lazuli</span>, <span title="opaque light blue-green">Turquoise</span>, 2 &times; <span title="opaque light pink">Rhodochrosite</span>, <span title="opaque mottled deep blue">Azurite</span>, <span title="translucent brown with golden center">Tiger eye</span>, <span title="translucent striped brown, blue, white, or red">Banded agate</span></li> <li><strong>Magic Items:</strong> Mithral armor, Scroll<sup>2nd</sup> of Ray of Enfeeblement <small>(Warlock)</small></li> <li> <strong>Sling</strong> (Unusable) </li>  </li>  </li>  </ul> </li> <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('YRyc2Yax');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> There are also many candles, burnt out in a pile of wax on an altar and some torn pieces of clothing next to it. </li>       </ul>

   <h5> Foreshadowing </h5> <ul>  <li> It is impossible to hear anything inside. </li>   </ul>  <h5> Doorways </h5> <ul>  <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('2Id6r0bZ');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <strong>E</strong> side - round iron door (<strong>Half-broken</strong>)  </li>            <li> <strong>N</strong> side - passage to area 45. </li>      </ul> <h5> Description </h5> <blockquote> Countless humanoid skulls “decorate” the boundaries and the walls are slick with slime. They  will attack anyone stepping in.  <p> <strong>Ghast</strong>   <hr/> <div id="block-YikSglm4" class="monster-block"> <div class="statblock"> <div class="statblock-top-row"> <div><span class="section-label">CR:</span> 2 (450 XP)</div> <div><span class="section-label">AC:</span> 13</div> <div><span class="section-label">HP:</span>  (8d8)</div> <div><span class="section-label">Speed:</span> Walk 30 ft.</div> </div> <table class="statblock-table"> <tr><th>STR</th><th>DEX</th><th>CON</th><th>INT</th><th>WIS</th><th>CHA</th></tr> <tr> <td>16 <small> +3 </small> </td> <td>17 <small> +4 </small> </td> <td>10 <small>  </small> </td> <td>11 <small> +1 </small> </td> <td>10 <small>  </small> </td> <td>8 <small> -1 </small> </td> </tr> </table> <div> <input class="monster-block-toggle" name="toggle-YikSglm4" id="toggle-YikSglm4" type="checkbox" onclick="javascript:document.getElementById('block-YikSglm4').scrollIntoView();"/> <div id="block-toggle-YikSglm4" class="statblock-container"> <ul>   <li><strong>Immunities: </strong> poison</li>   <li><strong>Senses: </strong> darkvision 60 ft.</li>   <li><strong>Alignment: </strong> Chaotic Evil</li>   <li><strong>Languages: </strong> Common</li>  </ul>  <hr/> <div><ul> <li><strong>Stench:</strong> Any creature that starts its turn within 5 feet of the ghast must succeed on a <strong>DC10</strong> Constitution saving throw or be <strong>poisoned</strong> until the start of its next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the ghast's Stench for 24 hours.</li><li><strong>Turn Defiance:</strong> The ghast and any ghouls within 30 feet of it have advantage on saving throws against effects that turn undead.</li> </ul></div>   <hr/> <h6>Actions</h6> <div><ul> <li><strong>Bite:</strong> <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d20+3' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d20+3');"><strong><strong>+3</strong></strong></a> to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Inflicts 10 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='2d6 + 3' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('2d6 + 3');"><strong>2d6 + 3</strong></a>) slashing damage. If the target is a creature other than an undead, it must succeed on a <strong>DC10</strong> Constitution saving throw or be <strong>paralyzed</strong> for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.</li> </ul></div>  </div> </div> </div> </div>  <hr/> <ul>  <li><a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('LwRpqRX1');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a>Monster Hoard: <ul> <li> <strong>252 gp</strong> in coins </li> <li><strong>100 gp worth of artifacts (25gp each):</strong> Carved bone statuette, Cloth-of-gold vestments, 2 &times; Small gold bracelet</li> <li><strong>Magic Items:</strong> Potion of speed, Scroll<sup>6th</sup> of Heal <small>(Cleric)</small></li> </ul> </li>  </ul> </p> </li> <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('bRPO2RrU');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> Many candles, burnt out in a pile of wax can be found in the far corner. </li>       </ul>

   <h5> Foreshadowing </h5> <ul>  <li> Traces of something heavy dragged on the ground could be found if examining around the entrances to this area. </li>   </ul>  <h5> Doorways </h5> <ul>  <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('ySuH2D9T');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <strong>N</strong> side - round iron door (<strong>Barricaded</strong>)  </li>   <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('68oIgg4o');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <strong>W</strong> side - round bronze door (<strong>Stuck</strong>)  </li>           <li> <strong>S</strong> side - passage to area 30. </li>   <li> <strong>E</strong> side - passage to area 35. </li>     </ul> <h5> Description </h5> <blockquote> This area stinks from excrements and the floor is deeply fractured.  There is a large crate near the far wall.  </blockquote> <ul>  <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('u9i9KQ1y');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> The crate is trapped. <strong>Loose</strong> debris is locked above the crate, released when a <strong>switch</strong> embedded in one of the wooden planks is triggered. When undetected using a <strong>DC15</strong> Wisdom (Perception, <small>passive or active</small>), it will drop down. Succeed in a <strong>DC15</strong> Dexterity saving throw or sustain <strong><a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d8' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d8');"><strong>1d8</strong></a> damage</strong>. </li><li>There’s a <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d6' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d6');"><strong>2-in-6</strong></a> chance the crate contains: <ul> <li> <strong>240 gp</strong> in coins </li> <li><strong>75 gp worth of artifacts (25gp each):</strong> Cloth-of-gold vestments, Copper chalice with silver filigree, Silver ewer</li> <li><strong>Magic Items:</strong> Potion of cloud giant strength, 2 &times; Potion of longevity</li> </ul> Otherwise, this place was already looted earlier.  </li> <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('TCPsccO7');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> A smashed lyre can be found near the wall on the far end. </li>       </ul>

   <h5> Foreshadowing </h5> <ul>  <li> When listening from outside, <strong>speaking Werewolfs</strong>  can be faintly heard from inside this area. </li>   </ul>  <h5> Doorways </h5> <ul>            <li> <strong>S</strong> side - passage to area 17. </li>      </ul> <h5> Description </h5> <blockquote> An oversized wooden coffin was smashed to pieces here and the entryway is blackened.  You see glowing eyes staring at you from inside.  </blockquote> <ul>  <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('v6bNOm3Z');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a>   There are 3 Werewolfs  inside.   They  will attack anyone stepping in.  <p> <strong>Werewolf</strong>   <hr/> <div id="block-IJIoNggD" class="monster-block"> <div class="statblock"> <div class="statblock-top-row"> <div><span class="section-label">CR:</span> 3 (700 XP)</div> <div><span class="section-label">AC:</span> 11in humanoid form,12 (natural armor)in wolf or hybrid form</div> <div><span class="section-label">HP:</span>  (9d8 + 18)</div> <div><span class="section-label">Speed:</span> Walk 30 ft. (40 ft. in wolf form)</div> </div> <table class="statblock-table"> <tr><th>STR</th><th>DEX</th><th>CON</th><th>INT</th><th>WIS</th><th>CHA</th></tr> <tr> <td>15 <small> +3 </small> </td> <td>13 <small> +2 </small> </td> <td>14 <small> +2 </small> </td> <td>10 <small>  </small> </td> <td>11 <small> +1 </small> </td> <td>10 <small>  </small> </td> </tr> </table> <div> <input class="monster-block-toggle" name="toggle-IJIoNggD" id="toggle-IJIoNggD" type="checkbox" onclick="javascript:document.getElementById('block-IJIoNggD').scrollIntoView();"/> <div id="block-toggle-IJIoNggD" class="statblock-container"> <ul>   <li><strong>Immunities: </strong> ; bludgeoning, piercing and slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered</li>    <li><strong>Alignment: </strong> Chaotic Evil</li>   <li><strong>Languages: </strong> Common (can't speak in wolf form)</li>  </ul>  <hr/> <div><ul> <li><strong>Shapechanger:</strong> The werewolf can use its action to polymorph into a wolf-humanoid hybrid or into a wolf, or back into its true form, which is humanoid. Its statistics, other than its AC, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.</li><li><strong>Keen Hearing and Smell:</strong> The werewolf has advantage on Wisdom (<strong>Perception</strong>) checks that rely on hearing or smell.</li> </ul></div>   <hr/> <h6>Actions</h6> <div><ul> <li><strong>Multiattack (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only):</strong> The werewolf makes two attacks: two with its spear (humanoid form) or one with its bite and one with its claws (hybrid form).</li><li><strong>Bite (Wolf or Hybrid Form Only):</strong> <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d20+4' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d20+4');"><strong><strong>+4</strong></strong></a> to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Inflicts 6 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d8 + 2' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d8 + 2');"><strong>1d8 + 2</strong></a>) piercing damage. If the target is a humanoid, it must succeed on a <strong>DC12</strong> Constitution saving throw or be cursed with werewolf lycanthropy.</li><li><strong>Claws (Hybrid Form Only):</strong> <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d20+4' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d20+4');"><strong><strong>+4</strong></strong></a> to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Inflicts 7 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='2d4 + 2' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('2d4 + 2');"><strong>2d4 + 2</strong></a>) slashing damage.</li><li><strong>Spear (Humanoid Form Only):</strong> <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d20+4' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d20+4');"><strong><strong>+4</strong></strong></a> to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one creature. Inflicts 5 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d6 + 2' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d6 + 2');"><strong>1d6 + 2</strong></a>) piercing damage, or 6 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d8 + 2' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d8 + 2');"><strong>1d8 + 2</strong></a>) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.</li> </ul></div>  </div> </div> </div> </div>  <hr/> <ul>  <li><a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('XIEkkGGP');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a>Monster Hoard: <ul> <li> <strong>155 gp</strong> in coins </li> <li><strong>110 gp worth of gemstones (10gp each):</strong> <span title="opaque black">Obsidian</span>, <span title="opaque gray-black">Hematite</span>, 2 &times; <span title="opaque light and dark blue with yellow flecks">Lapis lazuli</span>, <span title="opaque light blue-green">Turquoise</span>, <span title="opaque light pink">Rhodochrosite</span>, <span title="opaque mottled deep blue">Azurite</span>, 2 &times; <span title="opaque striated light and dark green">Malachite</span>, <span title="translucent pink or yellow-white with mossy gray or green markings">Moss agate</span>, <span title="translucent striped brown, blue, white, or red">Banded agate</span></li>  </ul> </li>  </ul> </p> </li> <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('UwaZgfQT');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> The rotting hide of a large animal can be found near the wall on the right. </li>       </ul>

   <h5> Foreshadowing </h5> <ul>  <li> It is impossible to hear anything inside. </li>   </ul>  <h5> Doorways </h5> <ul>  <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('XGKUtl7t');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <strong>E</strong> side - round wooden door (<strong>Locked <span class='alchemy'>&#128778;</span></strong>)   <ul><li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('w98F5u00');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <span class="spoiler" onmouseover="window.clearTimeout(this.spoilerTimeout);this.spoilerTimeout=window.setTimeout(() => {this.classList.add('revealed')},1000)" onmouseout="window.clearTimeout(this.spoilerTimeout);this.spoilerTimeout=window.setTimeout(() => {this.classList.remove('revealed')},1000)">The key is in <a href="/sandbox/nTR8nJOW/location/Q7LSuJ5X"><strong>area 91</strong></a></span> </li> </ul>   </li>   <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('hRXVjsTI');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <strong>S</strong> side - round wooden door (<strong>Half-broken</strong>)  </li>               </ul> <h5> Description </h5> <blockquote> Countless creepy crawlies all over rush back into the darkness and the entryway has a few rusty stains on it.    <h5> Foreshadowing </h5> <ul>  <li> A few single copper pieces could be found if examining the ground near the entrances to this area. </li>   </ul>  <h5> Doorways </h5> <ul>            <li> <strong>W</strong> side - passage to area 23. </li>   <li> <strong>N</strong> side - passage to area 44. </li>   <li> <strong>E</strong> side - passage to area 14. </li>    </ul> <h5> Description </h5> <blockquote> There are numerous scroll storage cavities and the corner sides have a few patches of dampness on them.  There are some big chests near the far wall.  </blockquote> <ul>  <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('0p6R2V6y');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> The chests are trapped. <strong>Loose</strong> stones are locked above the chests, released when a <strong>switch</strong> hidden under a pulling ring is triggered. When undetected using a <strong>DC15</strong> Wisdom (Perception, <small>passive or active</small>), it will drop down.     </h4>
  
   <h5> Doorways </h5> <ul>  <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('8H8uSgXX');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <strong>E</strong> side - arched iron door (<strong>Half-broken</strong>)  </li>  </ul>  <h5> Description </h5> <blockquote> An ice-cold breeze can be felt in the passage here. </blockquote>     <h5> Trap! </h5> There's a <strong>poisonous darts trap</strong> here, hidden inside <strong>shafts in the wall</strong>. When undetected using a <strong>DC17</strong> Wisdom (Perception, <small>passive or active</small>) check, it will trigger if stepping through its <strong>trip wire</strong>. Succeed a <strong>DC20</strong> Constitution saving throw or sustain <strong><a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d6' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d6');"><strong>1d6</strong></a></strong> turns of uncontrolled spasms.                                     <h5> Wandering Monsters </h5> <p> There's a <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d6' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d6');"><strong>1 in 6</strong></a> chance of encountering one of: </p>  <div class='condensed'></div> <table> <tr> <th> <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d7' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d7');"><strong>1d7</strong></a> </th> <th> Encounter </th> <th> Stats </th> </tr>   <tr> <td> 1 </td> <td> Specters </td> <td> <div id="block-ehPlRPfI" class="monster-block"> <div class="statblock"> <div class="statblock-top-row"> <div><span class="section-label">CR:</span> 1 (200 XP)</div> <div><span class="section-label">AC:</span> 12</div> <div><span class="section-label">HP:</span>  (5d8)</div> <div><span class="section-label">Speed:</span> Walk 0 ft.     </h4>
  
   <h5> Doorways </h5> <ul>  <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('2gkzeNUh');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <strong>S</strong> side - rectangular wooden door (<strong>Barricaded</strong>)  </li>  </ul>  <h5> Description </h5> <blockquote> The corrider here is dark and damp. </blockquote>     <h5> Trap! </h5> There's a crushing <Strong>swinging boulder trap</strong> here, <Strong>hidden</strong> inside the <Strong>wall</strong>. When undetected using a <strong>DC15</strong> Wisdom (Perception) check, it will trigger if stepping on <strong>pressure plate</strong>. Succeed a <strong>DC20</strong> Dexterity saving throw or sustain <strong><a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='2d4' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('2d4');"><strong>2d4</strong></a> damage</strong>.                             <h5> Wandering Monsters </h5> <p> There's a <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d6' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d6');"><strong>1 in    <h5> Doorways </h5> <ul>  <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('RKyX58qG');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <strong>S</strong> side - arched wooden door (<strong>Stuck</strong>)  </li>  </ul>  <h5> Description </h5> <blockquote> Dense spiderwebs drape the passage here. </blockquote>

    <h4 id="title">
    <span id="editable-title" data-attr="Title">Dungeon Corridor</span>

    </h4>

The target must succeed on a <strong>DC10</strong> Constitution saving throw against this magic or die. If the target dies, the will-o'-wisp regains 10 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='3d6' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('3d6');"><strong>3d6</strong></a>) hit points.</li><li><strong>Ephemeral:</strong> The will-o'-wisp can't wear or carry anything.</li><li><strong>Incorporeal Movement:</strong> The will-o'-wisp can move through other creatures and objects as if they were TAG:quickref. will-o'-wisp and its light magically become <strong>invisible</strong> until it attacks or uses its Consume Life, or until its TAG:status ends (as if TAG:status on a spell).</li> </ul></div>  </div> The target must succeed on a <strong>DC10</strong> Constitution saving throw or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the creature finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.</li> </ul></div>  </div> </div> </div> </div> </td> </tr>     <tr> <td> 8 </td> <td> Werewolves </td> <td> <div id="block-IJIoNggD" class="monster-block"> <div class="statblock"> <div class="statblock-top-row"> <div><span class="section-label">CR:</span> 3 (700 XP)</div> <div><span class="section-label">AC:</span> 11in humanoid form,12 (natural armor)in wolf or hybrid form</div> <div><span class="section-label">HP:</span>  (9d8 + 18)</div> <div><span class="section-label">Speed:</span> Walk 30 ft. (40 ft. in wolf form)</div> </div> <table class="statblock-table"> <tr><th>STR</th><th>DEX</th><th>CON</th><th>INT</th><th>WIS</th><th>CHA</th></tr> <tr> <td>15 <small> +3 </small> </td> <td>13 <small> +2 </small> </td> <td>14 <small> +2 </small> </td> <td>10 <small>  </small> </td> <td>11 <small> +1 </small> </td> <td>10 <small>  </small> </td> </tr> </table> <div> <input class="monster-block-toggle" name="toggle-IJIoNggD" id="toggle-IJIoNggD" type="checkbox" onclick="javascript:document.getElementById('block-IJIoNggD').scrollIntoView();"/> <div id="block-toggle-IJIoNggD" class="statblock-container"> <ul>   <li><strong>Immunities: </strong> ; bludgeoning, piercing and slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered</li>    <li><strong>Alignment: </strong> Chaotic Evil</li>   <li><strong>Languages: </strong> Common (can't speak in wolf form)</li>  </ul>  <hr/> <div><ul> <li><strong>Shapechanger:</strong> The werewolf can use its action to polymorph into a wolf-humanoid hybrid or into a wolf, or back into its true form, which is humanoid. Its statistics, other than its AC, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.</li><li><strong>Keen Hearing and Smell:</strong> The werewolf has advantage on Wisdom (<strong>Perception</strong>) checks that rely on hearing or smell.</li> </ul></div>   <hr/> <h6>Actions</h6> <div><ul> <li><strong>Multiattack (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only):</strong> The werewolf makes two attacks: two with its spear (humanoid form) or one with its bite and one with its claws (hybrid form).</li><li><strong>Bite (Wolf or Hybrid Form Only):</strong> <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d20+4' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d20+4');"><strong><strong>+4</strong></strong></a> to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Inflicts 6 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d8 + 2' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d8 + 2');"><strong>1d8 + 2</strong></a>) piercing damage. If the target is a humanoid, it must succeed on a <strong>DC12</strong> Constitution saving throw or be cursed with werewolf lycanthropy.</li><li><strong>Claws (Hybrid Form Only):</strong> <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d20+4' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d20+4');"><strong><strong>+4</strong></strong></a> to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Inflicts 7 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='2d4 + 2' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('2d4 + 2');"><strong>2d4 + 2</strong></a>) slashing damage.</li><li><strong>Spear (Humanoid Form Only):</strong> <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d20+4' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d20+4');"><strong><strong>+4</strong></strong></a> to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one creature. Inflicts 5 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d6 + 2' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d6 + 2');"><strong>1d6 + 2</strong></a>) piercing damage, or 6 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d8 + 2' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d8 + 2');"><strong>1d8 + 2</strong></a>) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.</li> </ul></div>  </div> </div> </div> </div> </td> </tr>    </table>

Inflicts 5 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d6 + 2' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d6 + 2');"><strong>1d6 + 2</strong></a>) piercing damage, or 6 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d8 + 2' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d8 + 2');"><strong>1d8 + 2</strong></a>) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.</li> </ul></div>  </div> </div> </div> </div> </td> </tr>     <tr> <td> 5 </td> <td> Specters </td> <td> <div id="block-ehPlRPfI" class="monster-block"> <div class="statblock"> <div class="statblock-top-row"> <div><span class="section-label">CR:</span> 1 (200 XP)</div> <div><span class="section-label">AC:</span> 12</div> <div><span class="section-label">HP:</span>  (5d8)</div> <div><span class="section-label">Speed:</span> Walk 0 ft.     </h4>
  
   <h5> Doorways </h5> <ul>  <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('703HrYbQ');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <strong>S</strong> side - round wooden door (<strong>Locked <span class='alchemy'>&#128870;</span></strong>)   <ul><li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('w4gMFYIx');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <span class="spoiler" onmouseover="window.clearTimeout(this.spoilerTimeout);this.spoilerTimeout=window.setTimeout(() => {this.classList.add('revealed')},1000)" onmouseout="window.clearTimeout(this.spoilerTimeout);this.spoilerTimeout=window.setTimeout(() => {this.classList.remove('revealed')},1000)">The key is in <a href="/sandbox/nTR8nJOW/location/IRwSCW7N"><strong>area 88</strong></a></span> </li> </ul>   </li>  </ul>  <h5> Description </h5> <blockquote> The corridor here stinks from excrements. </blockquote>                              <h5> Wandering Monsters </h5> <p> There's a <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d6' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d6');"><strong>1 in 6</strong></a> chance of encountering one of: </p>  <div class='condensed'></div> <table> <tr> <th> <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d5' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d5');"><strong>1d5</strong></a> </th> <th> Encounter </th> <th> Stats </th> </tr>   <tr> <td> 1 </td> <td> Swarm of Insects </td> <td> <div id="block-TAaLZICx" class="monster-block"> <div class="statblock"> <div class="statblock-top-row"> <div><span class="section-label">CR:</span> 1/2 (100 XP)</div> <div><span class="section-label">AC:</span> 12 (natural armor)</div> <div><span class="section-label">HP:</span>  (5d8)</div> <div><span class="section-label">Speed:</span> Walk 20 ft. Climb 20 ft.</div> </div> <table class="statblock-table"> <tr><th>STR</th><th>DEX</th><th>CON</th><th>INT</th><th>WIS</th><th>CHA</th></tr> <tr> <td>3 <small> -4 </small> </td> <td>13 <small> +2 </small> </td> <td>10 <small>  </small> </td> <td>1 <small> -5 </small> </td> <td>7 <small> -2 </small> </td> <td>1 <small> -5 </small> </td> </tr> </table> <div> <input class="monster-block-toggle" name="toggle-TAaLZICx" id="toggle-TAaLZICx" type="checkbox" onclick="javascript:document.getElementById('block-TAaLZICx').scrollIntoView();"/> <div id="block-toggle-TAaLZICx" class="statblock-container"> <ul>    <li><strong>Senses: </strong> blindsight 10 ft.</li>    </ul>  <hr/> <div><ul> <li><strong>Swarm:</strong> The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny insect. It takes 5 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d10' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d10');"><strong>1d10</strong></a>) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.</li><li><strong>Variable Illumination:</strong> The will-o'-wisp sheds bright light in a 5 to 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional number of ft. equal to the chosen radius. The will-o'-wisp can alter the radius as a bonus action.</li> </ul></div>   <hr/> <h6>Actions</h6> <div><ul> <li><strong>Shock:</strong> <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d20+4' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d20+4');"><strong><strong>+4</strong></strong></a> to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Inflicts 9 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='2d8' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('2d8');"><strong>2d8</strong></a>) lightning damage.</li><li><strong>Invisibility:</strong> The will-o'-wisp and its light magically become <strong>invisible</strong> until it attacks or uses its Consume Life, or until its TAG:status ends (as if TAG:status on a spell).</li> </ul></div>  </div> </div> </div> </div> </td> </tr>     <tr> <td> 4 </td> <td> Ghouls </td> <td> <div id="block-b5QgfoPQ" class="monster-block"> <div class="statblock"> <div class="statblock-top-row"> <div><span class="section-label">CR:</span> 1 (200 XP)</div> <div><span class="section-label">AC:</span> 12</div> <div><span class="section-label">HP:</span>  (5d8)</div> <div><span class="section-label">Speed:</span> Walk 30 ft.</div> </div> <table class="statblock-table"> <tr><th>STR</th><th>DEX</th><th>CON</th><th>INT</th><th>WIS</th><th>CHA</th></tr> <tr> <td>13 <small> +2 </small> </td> <td>15 <small> +3 </small> </td> <td>10 <small>  </small> </td> <td>7 <small> -2 </small> </td> <td>10 <small>  </small> </td> <td>6 <small> -2 </small> </td> </tr> </table> <div> <input class="monster-block-toggle" name="toggle-b5QgfoPQ" id="toggle-b5QgfoPQ" type="checkbox" onclick="javascript:document.getElementById('block-b5QgfoPQ').scrollIntoView();"/> <div id="block-toggle-b5QgfoPQ" class="statblock-container"> <ul>   <li><strong>Immunities: </strong> poison</li>   <li><strong>Senses: </strong> darkvision 60 ft.</li>   <li><strong>Alignment: </strong> Chaotic Evil</li>   <li><strong>Languages: </strong> Common</li>  </ul>   <hr/> <h6>Actions</h6> <div><ul> <li><strong>Bite:</strong> <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d20+2' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d20+2');"><strong><strong>+2</strong></strong></a> to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Inflicts 9 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='2d6 + 2' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('2d6 + 2');"><strong>2d6 + 2</strong></a>) piercing damage.</li><li><strong>Claws:</strong> <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d20+4' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d20+4');"><strong><strong>+4</strong></strong></a> to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Inflicts 7 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='2d4 + 2' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('2d4 + 2');"><strong>2d4 + 2</strong></a>) slashing damage. If the target is a creature other than an elf or undead, it must succeed on a <strong>DC10</strong> Constitution saving throw or be <strong>paralyzed</strong> for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.</li> </ul></div>  </div> </div> </div> </div> </td> </tr>       <tr> <td> 5 </td> <td> Wights </td> <td> <div id="block-WN7txAUk" class="monster-block"> <div class="statblock"> <div class="statblock-top-row"> <div><span class="section-label">CR:</span> 3 (700 XP)</div> <div><span class="section-label">AC:</span> 14 (studded leather armor)</div> <div><span class="section-label">HP:</span>  (6d8 + 18)</div> <div><span class="section-label">Speed:</span> Walk 30 ft.</div> </div> <table class="statblock-table"> <tr><th>STR</th><th>DEX</th><th>CON</th><th>INT</th><th>WIS</th><th>CHA</th></tr> <tr> <td>15 <small> +3 </small> </td> <td>14 <small> +2 </small> </td> <td>16 <small> +3 </small> </td> <td>10 <small>  </small> </td> <td>13 <small> +2 </small> </td> <td>15 <small> +3 </small> </td> </tr> </table> <div> <input class="monster-block-toggle" name="toggle-WN7txAUk" id="toggle-WN7txAUk" type="checkbox" onclick="javascript:document.getElementById('block-WN7txAUk').scrollIntoView();"/> <div id="block-toggle-WN7txAUk" class="statblock-container"> <ul>   <li><strong>Immunities: </strong> poison</li>   <li><strong>Senses: </strong> darkvision 60 ft.</li>   <li><strong>Alignment: </strong> Neutral Evil</li>   <li><strong>Languages: </strong> the languages it knew in life</li>  </ul>  <hr/> <div><ul> <li><strong>Sunlight Sensitivity:</strong> While in sunlight, the wight has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (<strong>Perception</strong>) checks that rely on sight.</li> </ul></div>   <hr/> <h6>Actions</h6> <div><ul> <li><strong>Multiattack:</strong> The wight makes two longsword attacks or two longbow attacks. It can use its Life Drain in place of one longsword attack.</li><li><strong>Life Drain:</strong> <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d20+4' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d20+4');"><strong><strong>+4</strong></strong></a> to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Inflicts 5 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d6 + 2' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d6 + 2');"><strong>1d6 + 2</strong></a>) necrotic damage. The target must succeed on a <strong>DC13</strong> Constitution saving throw or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0., A humanoid slain by this attack rises 24 hours later as a TAG:creature under the wight's control, unless the humanoid is restored to life or its body is destroyed. The wight can have no more than twelve zombies under its control at one time.</li><li><strong>Longsword:</strong> <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d20+4' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d20+4');"><strong><strong>+4</strong></strong></a> to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Inflicts 6 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d8 + 2' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d8 + 2');"><strong>1d8 + 2</strong></a>) slashing damage, or 7 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d10 + 2' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d10 + 2');"><strong>1d10 + 2</strong></a>) slashing damage if used with two hands.</li><li><strong>Longbow:</strong> <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d20+4' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d20+4');"><strong><strong>+4</strong></strong></a> to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Inflicts 6 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d8 + 2' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d8 + 2');"><strong>1d8 + 2</strong></a>) piercing damage.</li> </ul></div>  </div> </div> </div> </div> </td> </tr>    </table>  
  

  <a class="map-coords" hex="kvvxBFX3" x="90" y="25" zoom="2"> </a>

    </h4>
  
   <h5> Doorways </h5> <ul>  <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('Q1RLCwc2');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <strong>S</strong> side - round wooden door (<strong>Barricaded</strong>)  </li>  </ul>  <h5> Description </h5> <blockquote> The corridor here stinks from excrements. </blockquote>                                      <h5> Wandering Monsters </h5> <p> There's a <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d6' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d6');"><strong>1 in 6</strong></a> chance of encountering one of: </p>  <div class='condensed'></div> <table> <tr> <th> <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d7' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d7');"><strong>1d7</strong></a> </th> <th> Encounter </th> <th> Stats </th> </tr>   <tr> <td> 1 </td> <td> Swarm of Insects </td> <td> <div id="block-TAaLZICx" class="monster-block"> <div class="statblock"> <div class="statblock-top-row"> <div><span class="section-label">CR:</span> 1/2 (100 XP)</div> <div><span class="section-label">AC:</span> 12 (natural armor)</div> <div><span class="section-label">HP:</span>  (5d8)</div> <div><span class="section-label">Speed:</span> Walk 20 ft. Climb 20 ft.</div> </div> <table class="statblock-table"> <tr><th>STR</th><th>DEX</th><th>CON</th><th>INT</th><th>WIS</th><th>CHA</th></tr> <tr> <td>3 <small> -4 </small> </td> <td>13 <small> +2 </small> </td> <td>10 <small>  </small> </td> <td>1 <small> -5 </small> </td> <td>7 <small> -2 </small> </td> <td>1 <small> -5 </small> </td> </tr> </table> <div> <input class="monster-block-toggle" name="toggle-TAaLZICx" id="toggle-TAaLZICx" type="checkbox" onclick="javascript:document.getElementById('block-TAaLZICx').scrollIntoView();"/> <div id="block-toggle-TAaLZICx" class="statblock-container"> <ul>    <li><strong>Senses: </strong> blindsight 10 ft.</li>    </ul>  <hr/> <div><ul> <li><strong>Swarm:</strong> The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny insect. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.</li> </ul></div>   <hr/> <h6>Actions</h6> <div><ul> <li><strong>Bites:</strong> <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d20+3' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d20+3');"><strong><strong>+3</strong></strong></a> to hit, reach 0 ft., one target in the swarm's space. Inflicts 10 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='4d4' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('4d4');"><strong>4d4</strong></a>) piercing damage, or 5 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='2d4' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('2d4');"><strong>2d4</strong></a>) piercing damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer.</li> </ul></div>  </div> </div> </div> </div> </td> </tr>     <tr> <td> 2 </td> <td> Shadows </td> <td> <div id="block-ZqwmBfXf" class="monster-block"> <div class="statblock"> <div class="statblock-top-row"> <div><span class="section-label">CR:</span> 1/2 (100 XP)</div> <div><span class="section-label">AC:</span> 12</div> <div><span class="section-label">HP:</span>  (3d8 + 3)</div> <div><span class="section-label">Speed:</span> Walk 40 ft.</div> </div> <table class="statblock-table"> <tr><th>STR</th><th>DEX</th><th>CON</th><th>INT</th><th>WIS</th><th>CHA</th></tr> <tr> <td>6 <small> -2 </small> </td> <td>14 <small> +2 </small> </td> <td>13 <small> +2 </small> </td> <td>6 <small> -2 </small> </td> <td>10 <small>  </small> </td> <td>8 <small> -1 </small> </td> </tr> </table> <div> <input class="monster-block-toggle" name="toggle-ZqwmBfXf" id="toggle-ZqwmBfXf" type="checkbox" onclick="javascript:document.getElementById('block-ZqwmBfXf').scrollIntoView();"/> <div id="block-toggle-ZqwmBfXf" class="statblock-container"> <ul>   <li><strong>Immunities: </strong> necrotic and poison</li>   <li><strong>Senses: </strong> darkvision 60 ft.</li>   <li><strong>Alignment: </strong> Chaotic Evil</li>   </ul>  <hr/> <div><ul> <li><strong>Amorphous:</strong> The shadow can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.</li><li><strong>Shadow Stealth:</strong> While in dim light or darkness, the shadow can take the Hide action as a bonus action. Its stealth bonus is also improved to +6.</li><li><strong>Sunlight Weakness:</strong> While in sunlight, the shadow has disadvantage on attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws.</li> </ul></div>   <hr/> <h6>Actions</h6> <div><ul> <li><strong>Strength Drain:</strong> <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d20+4' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d20+4');"><strong><strong>+4</strong></strong></a> to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Inflicts 9 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='2d6 + 2' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('2d6 + 2');"><strong>2d6 + 2</strong></a>) necrotic damage, and the target's Strength score is reduced by <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d4' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d4');"><strong>1d4</strong></a>. The target dies if this reduces its Strength to 0. Otherwise, the reduction lasts until the target finishes a short or long rest., If a non-evil humanoid dies from this attack, a new shadow rises from the corpse <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d4' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d4');"><strong>1d4</strong></a> hours later.</li> </ul></div>  </div> </div> </div> </div> </td> </tr>     <tr> <td> 3 </td> <td> Werewolves </td> <td> <div id="block-IJIoNggD" class="monster-block"> <div class="statblock"> <div class="statblock-top-row"> <div><span class="section-label">CR:</span> 3 (700 XP)</div> <div><span class="section-label">AC:</span> 11in humanoid form,12 (natural armor)in wolf or hybrid form</div> <div><span class="section-label">HP:</span>  (9d8 + 18)</div> <div><span class="section-label">Speed:</span> Walk 30 ft. (40 ft. in wolf form)</div> </div> <table class="statblock-table"> <tr><th>STR</th><th>DEX</th><th>CON</th><th>INT</th><th>WIS</th><th>CHA</th></tr> <tr> <td>15 <small> +3 </small> </td> <td>13 <small> +2 </small> </td> <td>14 <small> +2 </small> </td> <td>10 <small>  </small> </td> <td>11 <small> +1 </small> </td> <td>10 <small>  </small> </td> </tr> </table> <div> <input class="monster-block-toggle" name="toggle-IJIoNggD" id="toggle-IJIoNggD" type="checkbox" onclick="javascript:document.getElementById('block-IJIoNggD').scrollIntoView();"/> <div id="block-toggle-IJIoNggD" class="statblock-container"> <ul>   <li><strong>Immunities: </strong> ; bludgeoning, piercing and slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered</li>    <li><strong>Alignment: </strong> Chaotic Evil</li>   <li><strong>Languages: </strong> Common (can't speak in wolf form)</li>  </ul>  <hr/> <div><ul> <li><strong>Shapechanger:</strong> The werewolf can use its action to polymorph into a wolf-humanoid hybrid or into a wolf, or back into its true form, which is humanoid. Its statistics, other than its AC, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.</li><li><strong>Keen Hearing and Smell:</strong> The werewolf has advantage on Wisdom (<strong>Perception</strong>) checks that rely on hearing or smell.</li> </ul></div>   <hr/> <h6>Actions</h6> <div><ul> <li><strong>Multiattack (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only):</strong> The werewolf makes two attacks: two with its spear (humanoid form) or one with its bite and one with its claws (hybrid form).</li><li><strong>Bite (Wolf or Hybrid Form Only):</strong> <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d20+4' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d20+4');"><strong><strong>+4</strong></strong></a> to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Inflicts 6 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d8 + 2' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d8 + 2');"><strong>1d8 + 2</strong></a>) piercing damage. If the target is a humanoid, it must succeed on a <strong>DC12</strong> Constitution saving throw or be cursed with werewolf lycanthropy.</li><li><strong>Claws (Hybrid Form Only):</strong> <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d20+4' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d20+4');"><strong><strong>+4</strong></strong></a> to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Inflicts 7 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='2d4 + 2' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('2d4 + 2');"><strong>2d4 + 2</strong></a>) slashing damage.</li><li><strong>Spear (Humanoid Form Only):</strong> <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d20+4' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d20+4');"><strong><strong>+4</strong></strong></a> to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one creature. Inflicts 5 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d6 + 2' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d6 + 2');"><strong>1d6 + 2</strong></a>) piercing damage, or 6 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d8 + 2' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d8 + 2');"><strong>1d8 + 2</strong></a>) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.</li> </ul></div>  </div> </div> </div> </div> </td> </tr>     <tr> <td> 4 </td> <td> Zombies </td> <td> <div id="block-F4vvx5gl" class="monster-block"> <div class="statblock"> <div class="statblock-top-row"> <div><span class="section-label">CR:</span> 1/4 (50 XP)</div> <div><span class="section-label">AC:</span> 8</div> <div><span class="section-label">HP:</span>  (3d8 + 9)</div> <div><span class="section-label">Speed:</span> Walk 20 ft.</div> </div> <table class="statblock-table"> <tr><th>STR</th><th>DEX</th><th>CON</th><th>INT</th><th>WIS</th><th>CHA</th></tr> <tr> <td>13 <small> +2 </small> </td> <td>6 <small> -2 </small> </td> <td>16 <small> +3 </small> </td> <td>3 <small> -4 </small> </td> <td>6 <small> -2 </small> </td> <td>5 <small> -3 </small> </td> </tr> </table> <div> <input class="monster-block-toggle" name="toggle-F4vvx5gl" id="toggle-F4vvx5gl" type="checkbox" onclick="javascript:document.getElementById('block-F4vvx5gl').scrollIntoView();"/> <div id="block-toggle-F4vvx5gl" class="statblock-container"> <ul>  <li><strong>Saving Throws: </strong> Wis +0</li>   <li><strong>Immunities: </strong> poison</li>   <li><strong>Senses: </strong> darkvision 60 ft.</li>   <li><strong>Alignment: </strong> Neutral Evil</li>   <li><strong>Languages: </strong> understands all languages it spoke in life but can't speak</li>  </ul>  <hr/> <div><ul> <li><strong>Undead Fortitude:</strong> If damage reduces the zombie to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit.    <h5> Doorways </h5> <ul>  <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('M5Th3M6Y');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <strong>N</strong> side - arched wooden door (<strong>Trapped</strong>)  <ul><li> There's a concealed 10 foot deep pit next to the door. When undetected using a <strong>DC15</strong> Wisdom (Perception) check, it will trigger if <strong>removing a specific object</strong> from its original place.     </h4>
  
   <h5> Doorways </h5> <ul>  <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('WijMRXxT');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <strong>S</strong> side - rectangular bronze door (<strong>Half-broken</strong>)  </li>  </ul>  <h5> Description </h5> <blockquote> Smelly liquid is flowing on the floor here. </blockquote>     <h5> Trap! </h5> There's a <strong>spring-loaded spears trap</strong> here, hidden inside <strong>shafts in the floor</strong>. When undetected using a <strong>DC17</strong> Wisdom (Perception, <small>passive or active</small>) check, it will trigger if stepping on <strong>pressure plate</strong>. Succeed a <strong>DC20</strong> Dexterity saving throw or sustain <strong><a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='2d4' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('2d4');"><strong>2d4</strong></a> damage</strong> from the violent thrust of the jumping spears.                     <h5> Wandering Monsters </h5> <p> There's a <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d6' <strong>poisoned</strong> until the start of its next turn. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.</li> </ul></div>  </div> </div> </div> </div> </td> </tr>     <tr> <td> 2 </td> <td> Zombies </td> <td> <div id="block-dHyBQ5Lk" class="monster-block"> <div class="statblock"> <div class="statblock-top-row"> <div><span class="section-label">CR:</span> 1/4 (50 XP)</div> <div><span class="section-label">AC:</span> 8</div> <div><span class="section-label">HP:</span>  (3d8 + 9)</div> <div><span class="section-label">Speed:</span> Walk 20 ft.</div> </div> <table class="statblock-table"> <tr><th>STR</th><th>DEX</th><th>CON</th><th>INT</th><th>WIS</th><th>CHA</th></tr> <tr> <td>13 <small> +2 </small> </td> <td>6 <small> -2 </small> </td> <td>16 <small> +3 </small> </td> <td>3 <small> -4 </small> </td> <td>6 <small> -2 </small> </td> <td>5 <small> -3 </small> </td> </tr> </table> <div> <input class="monster-block-toggle" name="toggle-dHyBQ5Lk" id="toggle-dHyBQ5Lk" type="checkbox" onclick="javascript:document.getElementById('block-dHyBQ5Lk').scrollIntoView();"/> <div id="block-toggle-dHyBQ5Lk" class="statblock-container"> <ul>  <li><strong>Saving Throws: </strong> Wis +0</li>   <li><strong>Immunities: </strong> poison</li>   <li><strong>Senses: </strong> darkvision 60 ft.</li>   <li><strong>Alignment: </strong> Neutral Evil</li>   <li><strong>Languages: </strong> understands all languages it spoke in life but can't speak</li>  </ul>  <hr/> <div><ul> <li><strong>Undead Fortitude:</strong> If damage reduces the zombie to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit.
