    </h4>
  
   <h5> Doorways </h5> <ul>  <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('wSBtOUgy');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <strong>N</strong> side - rectangular bronze door (<strong>Half-broken</strong>)  </li>  </ul>  <h5> Description </h5> <blockquote> Each step here sends countless creepy crawlies back into the dark. </blockquote>     <h5> Trap! </h5> There's an <strong>acidic vapour trap</strong> here. When undetected using a <strong>DC17</strong> Wisdom (Perception, <small>passive or active</small>) check, it will trigger if stepping through its <strong>trip wire</strong>, causing a spray of acid to come out of a <strong>hole in the wall</strong>. Succeed a <strong>DC20</strong> Dexterity saving throw or sustain <strong><a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d6' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d6');"><strong>1d6</strong></a> damage</strong> by acid.                             <h5> Wandering Monsters </h5> <p> There's a <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d6' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d6');"><strong>1 in 6</strong></a> chance of encountering one of: </p>  <div class='condensed'></div> <table> <tr> <th> <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d5' all languages it spoke in life but can't speak</li>  </ul>  <hr/> <div><ul> <li><strong>Undead Fortitude:</strong> If damage reduces the zombie to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving On a success, the zombie drops to 1 hit point instead.</li> </ul></div>   <hr/> <h6>Actions</h6> <div><ul> <li><strong>Slam:</strong> <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d20+3' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d20+3');"><strong><strong>+3</strong></strong></a> to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.</li> </ul></div>   <hr/> <h6>Actions</h6> <div><ul> <li><strong>Bites:</strong> <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d20+3' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d20+3');"><strong><strong>+3</strong></strong></a> to hit, reach 0 ft., one target in the swarm's space. onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('2d4');"><strong>2d4</strong></a>) piercing damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer., A creature reduced to 0 hit points by a swarm of centipedes is stable but <strong>poisoned</strong> for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and <strong>paralyzed</strong> while <strong>poisoned</strong> in this way.</li> </ul></div>  </div>    <h5> Doorways </h5> <ul>  <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('t8VlKK4r');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <strong>E</strong> side - odd-shaped wooden door (<strong>Locked <span class='alchemy'>&#128846;</span></strong>)   <ul><li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('NxNJ8MZ1');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <span class="spoiler" href="/sandbox/nTR8nJOW/location/pDvRJwLa"><strong>area 12</strong></a></span> </li> </ul>   </li>  <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('Oep6hOCP');"><i class="fa => {this.classList.add('revealed')},1000)" onmouseout="window.clearTimeout(this.spoilerTimeout);this.spoilerTimeout=window.setTimeout(() => {this.classList.remove('revealed')},1000)">The key is in <a href="/sandbox/nTR8nJOW/location/PPLmUCMs"><strong>area 76</strong></a></span> </li> </ul>   </li>  </ul>  <h5> Description </h5> <blockquote> The darkness here is deep and paralyzing. </blockquote>                          <h5> Wandering Monsters </h5> <p> There's a <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d6' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d6');"><strong>1 in 6</strong></a> chance of encountering one of: </p>  <div class='condensed'></div> <table> <tr> <th> <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d4' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d4');"><strong>1d4</strong></a> </th>     <h4 id="title">
    <span id="editable-title" data-attr="Title">Dungeon Corridor</span>

   <h5> Doorways </h5> <ul>  <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('QMve5scq');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <strong>E</strong> side - rectangular iron door (<strong>Locked <span class='alchemy'>&#128812;</span></strong>)   <ul><li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('yCB36AqU');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <span class="spoiler" onmouseover="window.clearTimeout(this.spoilerTimeout);this.spoilerTimeout=window.setTimeout(() => {this.classList.add('revealed')},1000)" onmouseout="window.clearTimeout(this.spoilerTimeout);this.spoilerTimeout=window.setTimeout(() => {this.classList.remove('revealed')},1000)">The key is in <a href="/sandbox/nTR8nJOW/location/IzQnDOyg"><strong>area 29</strong></a></span> </li> </ul>   </li>  </ul>  <h5> Description </h5> <blockquote> An ice-cold breeze can be felt in the passage here. </blockquote>

   <h5> Doorways </h5> <ul>  <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('S8O10zPa');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <strong>E</strong> side - arched wooden door (<strong>Stuck</strong>)  </li>  </ul>  <h5> Description </h5> <blockquote> Roaches crawl over the walls and floor of this passage. </blockquote>     <h5> Trap! </h5> There's a razor-sharp 4' tall <Strong>swinging blade trap</strong> here, <Strong>hidden</strong> inside a thin long <Strong>wall slit</strong>. When undetected using a <strong>DC15</strong> Wisdom (Perception, <small>passive or active</small>) check, it will trigger if stepping through its <strong>trip wire</strong>. Succeed a <strong>DC20</strong> Dexterity saving throw or sustain <Strong><a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='2d4' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('2d4');"><strong>2d4</strong></a> damage</strong>.                                 <h5> Wandering Monsters </h5> <p> There's a <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d6' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d6');"><strong>1 in     <div hidden id="doc-title"> Dungeon Corridor in Crypt of the Mourning Goblin </div>
    <h4 id="title">
    <span id="editable-title" data-attr="Title">Dungeon Corridor</span>
    <span class="breadcrumbs">  <a class='breadcrumbs-icon' href='/sandbox/nTR8nJOW' title='Fullscreen Hex Map'> <i> <svg fill='currentColor' style='vertical-align:text-top;' width='1.5em'     </h4>
  
   <h5> Doorways </h5> <ul>  <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('syK0dy6x');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <strong>S</strong> side - rectangular wooden door (<strong>Locked <span class='alchemy'>&#128823;</span></strong>)   <ul><li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('UmbMkHKb');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <span class="spoiler" onmouseover="window.clearTimeout(this.spoilerTimeout);this.spoilerTimeout=window.setTimeout(() => {this.classList.add('revealed')},1000)" onmouseout="window.clearTimeout(this.spoilerTimeout);this.spoilerTimeout=window.setTimeout(() => {this.classList.remove('revealed')},1000)">The key is in <a href="/sandbox/nTR8nJOW/location/7jGsHIA5"><strong>area 67</strong></a></span> </li> </ul>   </li>  <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('vhUEihJE');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <strong>N</strong> side - secret door (requiring a <strong>passphrase</strong>)  <ul><li> If detected, a gentle voice will sing <strong>"Eternal"</strong>. <span class="spoiler" onmouseover="window.clearTimeout(this.spoilerTimeout);this.spoilerTimeout=window.setTimeout(() => {this.classList.add('revealed')},1000)" onmouseout="window.clearTimeout(this.spoilerTimeout);this.spoilerTimeout=window.setTimeout(() => {this.classList.remove('revealed')},1000)">The full passphrase is in <strong><a href="/sandbox/nTR8nJOW/location/XfvFFvnq">area 43</a></strong>. Sing or use the phrase in a song to open.</span>  </li></ul>  </li>  </ul>  <h5> Description </h5> <blockquote> Each step here sends countless creepy crawlies back into the dark. </blockquote> of encountering one of: </p>  <div class='condensed'></div> <table> <tr> <th> <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d7' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d7');"><strong>1d7</strong></a>    <h5> Doorways </h5> <ul>  <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('gFc60ztj');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <strong>W</strong> side - triangle wooden door (<strong>Barricaded</strong>)  </li>  </ul>  <h5> Description </h5> <blockquote> An ice-cold breeze can be felt in the passage here. </blockquote>

   <h5> Doorways </h5> <ul>  <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('9MEG7gVB');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <strong>W</strong> side - arched bronze door (<strong>Half-broken</strong>)  </li>  </ul>  <h5> Description </h5> <blockquote> Smelly liquid is flowing on the floor here. </blockquote>     <h5> Trap! </h5> There's a razor-sharp 4' tall <Strong>swinging blade trap</strong> here, <Strong>hidden</strong> inside a thin long <Strong>wall slit</strong>.     </h4>

   <h5> Doorways </h5> <ul>  <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('6XwbSC75');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <strong>S</strong> side - rectangular wooden door (<strong>Locked <span class='alchemy'>&#128779;</span></strong>)   <ul><li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('UrDluV9W');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <span class="spoiler" onmouseover="window.clearTimeout(this.spoilerTimeout);this.spoilerTimeout=window.setTimeout(() => {this.classList.add('revealed')},1000)" onmouseout="window.clearTimeout(this.spoilerTimeout);this.spoilerTimeout=window.setTimeout(() => {this.classList.remove('revealed')},1000)">The key is in <a href="/sandbox/nTR8nJOW/location/MRKqWDq6"><strong>area 86</strong></a></span> </li> </ul>   </li>  </ul>  <h5> Description </h5> <blockquote> The corridor here is damp and slippery from sludge. </blockquote>     <h5> Trap! </h5> There's a <strong>deadly pit</strong> here, 6' deep, covered under <strong>thin wood planks</strong>. If undetected using a <strong>DC15</strong> Wisdom (Perception, <small>passive or active</small>) check, there's a chance of stepping into it. Succeed a <strong>DC20</strong> Dexterity saving throw or fall in and sustain <strong><a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='2d6' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('2d6');"><strong>2d6</strong></a> damage</strong> from the long rusty spikes at the bottom.                                     <h5> Wandering Monsters </h5> Its statistics, other than its AC, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.</li><li><strong>Keen Hearing and Smell:</strong> The werewolf has advantage on Wisdom (<strong>Perception</strong>) checks that rely on hearing or smell.</li> </ul></div>   <hr/> <h6>Actions</h6> <div><ul> <li><strong>Multiattack (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only):</strong> The werewolf makes two attacks: two with its spear (humanoid form) or one with its bite and one with its claws (hybrid form).</li><li><strong>Bite (Wolf or Hybrid Form Only):</strong> <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d20+4' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d20+4');"><strong><strong>+4</strong></strong></a> to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. If the target is a humanoid, it must succeed on a <strong>DC12</strong> Constitution saving throw or be cursed with werewolf lycanthropy.</li><li><strong>Claws (Hybrid Form Only):</strong> <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d20+4' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d20+4');"><strong><strong>+4</strong></strong></a> to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Inflicts 7 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='2d4 + 2' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('2d4 + 2');"><strong>2d4 + 2</strong></a>) slashing damage.</li><li><strong>Spear (Humanoid Form Only):</strong> <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d20+4' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d20+4');"><strong><strong>+4</strong></strong></a> to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one creature. Inflicts 5 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d6 + 2' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d6 + 2');"><strong>1d6 + 2</strong></a>) piercing damage, or 6 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d8 + 2' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d8 + 2');"><strong>1d8 + 2</strong></a>) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.</li> </ul></div>  </div> </div> </div> </div> </td> </tr>     <tr> <td> 7 </td> <td> Ghasts </td> <td> <div id="block-YikSglm4" class="monster-block"> <div class="statblock"> <div class="statblock-top-row"> <div><span class="section-label">CR:</span> 2 (450 XP)</div> <div><span class="section-label">AC:</span> 13</div> <div><span class="section-label">HP:</span>  (8d8)</div> <div><span class="section-label">Speed:</span> Walk 30 ft.</div> </div> <table class="statblock-table"> <tr><th>STR</th><th>DEX</th><th>CON</th><th>INT</th><th>WIS</th><th>CHA</th></tr> <tr> <td>16 <small> +3 </small> </td> <td>17 <small> +4 </small> </td> <td>10 <small>  </small> </td> <td>11 <small> +1 </small> </td> <td>10 <small>  </small> </td> <td>8 <small> -1 </small> </td> </tr> </table> <div> <input class="monster-block-toggle" name="toggle-YikSglm4" id="toggle-YikSglm4" type="checkbox" onclick="javascript:document.getElementById('block-YikSglm4').scrollIntoView();"/> <div id="block-toggle-YikSglm4" class="statblock-container"> <ul>   <li><strong>Immunities: </strong> poison</li>   <li><strong>Senses: </strong> darkvision 60 ft.</li>   <li><strong>Alignment: </strong> Chaotic Evil</li>   <li><strong>Languages: </strong> Common</li>  </ul>  <hr/> <div><ul> <li><strong>Stench:</strong> Any creature that starts its turn within 5 feet of the ghast must succeed on a <strong>DC10</strong> Constitution saving throw or be <strong>poisoned</strong> until the start of its next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the ghast's Stench for 24 hours.</li><li><strong>Turn Defiance:</strong> The ghast and any ghouls within 30 feet of it have advantage on saving throws against effects that turn undead.</li> </ul></div>   <hr/> <h6>Actions</h6> <div><ul> <li><strong>Bite:</strong> <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d20+3' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d20+3');"><strong><strong>+3</strong></strong></a> to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Inflicts 12 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='2d8 + 3' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('2d8 + 3');"><strong>2d8 + 3</strong></a>) piercing damage.</li><li><strong>Claws:</strong> <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d20+5' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d20+5');"><strong><strong>+5</strong></strong></a> to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Inflicts 10 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='2d6 + 3' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('2d6 + 3');"><strong>2d6 + 3</strong></a>) slashing damage. If the target is a creature other than an undead, it must succeed on a <strong>DC10</strong> Constitution saving throw or be <strong>paralyzed</strong> for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.</li> </ul></div>  </div> </div> </div> </div> </td> </tr>     <tr> <td> 8 </td> <td> Warhorse Skeleton </td> <td> <div id="block-h8Sct6kc" class="monster-block"> <div class="statblock"> <div class="statblock-top-row"> <div><span class="section-label">CR:</span> 1/2 (100 XP)</div> <div><span class="section-label">AC:</span> 13 (barding scraps)</div> <div><span class="section-label">HP:</span>  (3d10 + 6)</div> <div><span class="section-label">Speed:</span> Walk 60 ft.</div> </div> <table class="statblock-table"> <tr><th>STR</th><th>DEX</th><th>CON</th><th>INT</th><th>WIS</th><th>CHA</th></tr> <tr> <td>18 <small> +4 </small> </td> <td>12 <small> +1 </small> </td> <td>15 <small> +3 </small> </td> <td>2 <small> -4 </small> </td> <td>8 <small> -1 </small> </td> <td>5 <small> -3 </small> </td> </tr> </table> <div> <input class="monster-block-toggle" name="toggle-h8Sct6kc" id="toggle-h8Sct6kc" type="checkbox" onclick="javascript:document.getElementById('block-h8Sct6kc').scrollIntoView();"/> <div id="block-toggle-h8Sct6kc" class="statblock-container"> <ul>   <li><strong>Immunities: </strong> poison</li>   <li><strong>Senses: </strong> darkvision 60 ft.</li>   <li><strong>Alignment: </strong> Lawful Evil</li>   </ul>   <hr/> <h6>Actions</h6> <div><ul> <li><strong>Hooves:</strong> <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d20+6' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d20+6');"><strong><strong>+6</strong></strong></a> to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Inflicts 7 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='2d4 + 2' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('2d4 + 2');"><strong>2d4 + 2</strong></a>) slashing damage. If the target is a creature other than an elf or undead, it must succeed on a <strong>DC10</strong> Constitution saving throw or be <strong>paralyzed</strong> for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.</li> </ul></div>  </div> </div> </div> </div> </td> </tr>     <tr> <td> 5 </td> <td> Ghasts </td> <td> <div id="block-YikSglm4" class="monster-block"> <div class="statblock"> <div class="statblock-top-row"> <div><span class="section-label">CR:</span> 2 (450 XP)</div> <div><span class="section-label">AC:</span> 13</div> <div><span class="section-label">HP:</span>  (8d8)</div> <div><span class="section-label">Speed:</span> Walk 30 ft.</div> </div> <table class="statblock-table"> <tr><th>STR</th><th>DEX</th><th>CON</th><th>INT</th><th>WIS</th><th>CHA</th></tr> <tr> <td>16 <small> +3 </small> </td> <td>17 <small> +4 </small> </td> <td>10 <small>  </small> </td> <td>11 <small> +1 </small> </td> <td>10 <small>  </small> </td> <td>8 <small> -1 </small> </td> </tr> </table> <div> <input class="monster-block-toggle" name="toggle-YikSglm4" id="toggle-YikSglm4" type="checkbox" onclick="javascript:document.getElementById('block-YikSglm4').scrollIntoView();"/> <div id="block-toggle-YikSglm4" class="statblock-container"> <ul>   <li><strong>Immunities: </strong> poison</li>   <li><strong>Senses: </strong> darkvision 60 ft.</li>   <li><strong>Alignment: </strong> Chaotic Evil</li>   <li><strong>Languages: </strong> Common</li>  </ul>  <hr/> <div><ul> <li><strong>Stench:</strong> Any creature that starts its turn within 5 feet of the ghast must succeed on a <strong>DC10</strong> Constitution saving throw or be <strong>poisoned</strong> until the start of its next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the ghast's Stench for 24 hours.</li><li><strong>Turn Defiance:</strong> The ghast and any ghouls within 30 feet of it have advantage on saving throws against effects that turn undead.</li> </ul></div>   <hr/> <h6>Actions</h6> <div><ul> <li><strong>Bite:</strong> <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d20+3' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d20+3');"><strong><strong>+3</strong></strong></a> to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Inflicts 12 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='2d8 + 3' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('2d8 + 3');"><strong>2d8 + 3</strong></a>) piercing damage.</li><li><strong>Claws:</strong> <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d20+5' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d20+5');"><strong><strong>+5</strong></strong></a> to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Inflicts 10 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='2d6 + 3' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('2d6 + 3');"><strong>2d6 + 3</strong></a>) slashing damage. If the target is a creature other than an undead, it must succeed on a <strong>DC10</strong> Constitution saving throw or be <strong>paralyzed</strong> for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.</li> </ul></div>  </div> </div> </div> </div> </td> </tr>     <tr> <td> 6 </td> <td> Zombies </td> <td> <div id="block-KAq0TsjR" class="monster-block"> <div class="statblock"> <div class="statblock-top-row"> <div><span class="section-label">CR:</span> 1/4 (50 XP)</div> <div><span class="section-label">AC:</span> 8</div> <div><span class="section-label">HP:</span>  (3d8 + 9)</div> <div><span class="section-label">Speed:</span> Walk 20 ft.</div> </div> <table class="statblock-table"> <tr><th>STR</th><th>DEX</th><th>CON</th><th>INT</th><th>WIS</th><th>CHA</th></tr> <tr> <td>13 <small> +2 </small> </td> <td>6 <small> -2 </small> </td> <td>16 <small> +3 </small> </td> <td>3 <small> -4 </small> </td> <td>6 <small> -2 </small> </td> <td>5 <small> -3 </small> </td> </tr> </table> <div> <input class="monster-block-toggle" name="toggle-KAq0TsjR" id="toggle-KAq0TsjR" type="checkbox" onclick="javascript:document.getElementById('block-KAq0TsjR').scrollIntoView();"/> <div id="block-toggle-KAq0TsjR" class="statblock-container"> <ul>  <li><strong>Saving Throws: </strong> Wis +0</li>   <li><strong>Immunities: </strong> poison</li>   <li><strong>Senses: </strong> darkvision 60 ft.</li>   <li><strong>Alignment: </strong> Neutral Evil</li>   <li><strong>Languages: </strong> understands all languages it spoke in life but can't speak</li>  </ul>  <hr/> <div><ul> <li><strong>Undead Fortitude:</strong> If damage reduces the zombie to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the zombie drops to 1 hit point instead.</li> </ul></div>   <hr/> <h6>Actions</h6> <div><ul> <li><strong>Slam:</strong> <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d20+3' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d20+3');"><strong><strong>+3</strong></strong></a> to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Inflicts 4 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d6 + 1' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d6 + 1');"><strong>1d6 + 1</strong></a>) bludgeoning damage.</li> </ul></div>  </div> </div> </div> </div> </td> </tr>      </table>

    </h4>
  
   <h5> Doorways </h5> <ul>  <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('3mMGMPwU');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <strong>S</strong> side - rectangular bronze door (<strong>Stuck</strong>)  </li>  </ul>  <h5> Description </h5> <blockquote> Droplets of moisture, or so you hope, are dripping down here. </blockquote>                                        <h5> Wandering Monsters </h5> <p> There's a <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d6' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d6');"><strong>1 in 6</strong></a> chance of encountering one of: </p>  <div class='condensed'></div> <table> <tr> <th> <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d8' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d8');"><strong>1d8</strong></a> </th> <th> Encounter </th> <th> Stats </th> </tr>   <tr> <td> 1 </td> <td> Will-o'-Wisps </td> <td> <div id="block-QmDNCCJ0" class="monster-block"> <div class="statblock"> <div class="statblock-top-row"> <div><span class="section-label">CR:</span> 2 (450 XP)</div> <div><span class="section-label">AC:</span> 19</div> <div><span class="section-label">HP:</span>  (9d4)</div> <div><span class="section-label">Speed:</span> Walk 0 ft. Fly 50 ft. (hover)</div> </div> <table class="statblock-table"> <tr><th>STR</th><th>DEX</th><th>CON</th><th>INT</th><th>WIS</th><th>CHA</th></tr> <tr> <td>1 <small> -5 </small> </td> <td>28 <small> +9 </small> </td> <td>10 <small>  </small> </td> <td>13 <small> +2 </small> </td> <td>14 <small> +2 </small> </td> <td>11 <small> +1 </small> </td> </tr> </table> <div> <input class="monster-block-toggle" name="toggle-QmDNCCJ0" id="toggle-QmDNCCJ0" type="checkbox" onclick="javascript:document.getElementById('block-QmDNCCJ0').scrollIntoView();"/> <div id="block-toggle-QmDNCCJ0" class="statblock-container"> <ul>   <li><strong>Immunities: </strong> lightning and poison</li>   <li><strong>Senses: </strong> darkvision 120 ft.</li>   <li><strong>Alignment: </strong> Chaotic Evil</li>   <li><strong>Languages: </strong> the languages it knew in life</li>  </ul>  <hr/> <div><ul> <li><strong>Consume Life:</strong> As a bonus action, the will-o'-wisp can target one creature it can see within 5 feet of it that has 0 hit points and is still alive. The target must succeed on a <strong>DC10</strong> Constitution saving throw against this magic or die. If the target dies, the will-o'-wisp regains 10 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='3d6' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('3d6');"><strong>3d6</strong></a>) hit points.</li><li><strong>Ephemeral:</strong> The will-o'-wisp can't wear or carry anything.</li><li><strong>Incorporeal Movement:</strong> The will-o'-wisp can move through other creatures and objects as if they were TAG:quickref. It takes 5 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d10' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d10');"><strong>1d10</strong></a>) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.</li><li><strong>Variable Illumination:</strong> The will-o'-wisp sheds bright light in a 5 to 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional number of ft. equal to the chosen radius. The will-o'-wisp can alter the radius as a bonus action.</li> </ul></div>   <hr/> <h6>Actions</h6> <div><ul> <li><strong>Shock:</strong> <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d20+4' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d20+4');"><strong><strong>+4</strong></strong></a> to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Inflicts 9 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='2d8' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('2d8');"><strong>2d8</strong></a>) lightning damage.</li><li><strong>Invisibility:</strong> The will-o'-wisp and its light magically become <strong>invisible</strong> until it attacks or uses its Consume Life, or until its TAG:status ends (as if TAG:status on a spell).</li> </ul></div>  </div> </div> </div> </div> </td> </tr>     <tr> <td> 2 </td> <td> Shadows </td> <td> <div id="block-ZqwmBfXf" class="monster-block"> <div class="statblock"> <div class="statblock-top-row"> <div><span class="section-label">CR:</span> 1/2 (100 XP)</div> <div><span class="section-label">AC:</span> 12</div> <div><span class="section-label">HP:</span>  (3d8 + 3)</div> <div><span class="section-label">Speed:</span> Walk 40 ft.</div> </div> <table class="statblock-table"> <tr><th>STR</th><th>DEX</th><th>CON</th><th>INT</th><th>WIS</th><th>CHA</th></tr> <tr> <td>6 <small> -2 </small> </td> <td>14 <small> +2 </small> </td> <td>13 <small> +2 </small> </td> <td>6 <small> -2 </small> </td> <td>10 <small>  </small> </td> <td>8 <small> -1 </small> </td> </tr> </table> <div> <input class="monster-block-toggle" name="toggle-ZqwmBfXf" id="toggle-ZqwmBfXf" type="checkbox" onclick="javascript:document.getElementById('block-ZqwmBfXf').scrollIntoView();"/> <div id="block-toggle-ZqwmBfXf" class="statblock-container"> <ul>   <li><strong>Immunities: </strong> necrotic and poison</li>   <li><strong>Senses: </strong> darkvision 60 ft.</li>   <li><strong>Alignment: </strong> Chaotic Evil</li>   </ul>  <hr/> <div><ul> <li><strong>Amorphous:</strong> The shadow can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.</li><li><strong>Shadow Stealth:</strong> While in dim light or darkness, the shadow can take the Hide action as a bonus action. Its stealth bonus is also improved to +6.</li><li><strong>Sunlight Weakness:</strong> While in sunlight, the shadow has disadvantage on attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws.</li> </ul></div>   <hr/> <h6>Actions</h6> <div><ul> <li><strong>Strength Drain:</strong> <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d20+4' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d20+4');"><strong><strong>+4</strong></strong></a> to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Inflicts 9 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='2d6 + 2' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('2d6 + 2');"><strong>2d6 + 2</strong></a>) necrotic damage, and the target's Strength score is reduced by <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d4' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d4');"><strong>1d4</strong></a>. The target dies if this reduces its Strength to 0. Otherwise, the reduction lasts until the target finishes a short or long rest., If a non-evil humanoid dies from this attack, a new shadow rises from the corpse <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d4' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d4');"><strong>1d4</strong></a> hours later.</li> </ul></div>  </div> </div> </div> </div> </td> </tr>     <tr> <td> 3 </td> <td> Swarm of Insects </td> <td> <div id="block-PS6O0xjU" class="monster-block"> <div class="statblock"> <div class="statblock-top-row"> <div><span class="section-label">CR:</span> 1/2 (100 XP)</div> <div><span class="section-label">AC:</span> 12 (natural armor)</div> <div><span class="section-label">HP:</span>  (5d8)</div> <div><span class="section-label">Speed:</span> Walk 20 ft.     </h4>

    </h4>

    </h4>
  
   <h5> Description </h5> <blockquote> Droplets of moisture, or so you hope, are dripping down here. </blockquote>     <h5> Trap! </h5> There's a <strong>poisonous darts trap</strong> here, hidden inside <strong>shafts in the wall</strong>. When undetected using a <strong>DC17</strong> Wisdom (Perception, <small>passive or active</small>) check, it will trigger if causing a <strong>sound sensitive membrane</strong> to vibrate. Succeed a <strong>DC15</strong> Constitution saving throw or die in <strong><a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='3d4' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('3d4');"><strong>3d4</strong></a></strong> turns.                                 <h5> Wandering Monsters </h5> <p> There's a <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d6' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d6');"><strong>1 in 6</strong></a> chance of encountering one of: </p>  <div class='condensed'></div> <table> <tr> <th> <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d7' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d7');"><strong>1d7</strong></a> </th> <th> Encounter </th> <th> Stats </th> </tr>   <tr> <td> 1 </td> <td> Swarm of Insects </td> <td> <div id="block-kQFhonf0" class="monster-block"> <div class="statblock"> <div class="statblock-top-row"> <div><span class="section-label">CR:</span> 1/2 (100 XP)</div> <div><span class="section-label">AC:</span> 12 (natural armor)</div> <div><span class="section-label">HP:</span>  (5d8)</div> <div><span class="section-label">Speed:</span> Walk 20 ft. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.</li> </ul></div>  </div> </div> </div> </div> </td> </tr>       <tr> <td> 10 </td> <td> Shadows </td> <td> <div id="block-ZqwmBfXf" class="monster-block"> <div class="statblock"> <div class="statblock-top-row"> <div><span class="section-label">CR:</span> 1/2 (100 XP)</div> <div><span class="section-label">AC:</span> 12</div> <div><span class="section-label">HP:</span>  (3d8 + 3)</div> <div><span class="section-label">Speed:</span> Walk 40 ft.</div> </div> <table class="statblock-table"> <tr><th>STR</th><th>DEX</th><th>CON</th><th>INT</th><th>WIS</th><th>CHA</th></tr> <tr> <td>6 <small> -2 </small> </td> <td>14 <small> +2 </small> </td> <td>13 <small> +2 </small> </td> <td>6 <small> -2 </small> </td> <td>10 <small>  </small> </td> <td>8 <small> -1 </small> </td> </tr> </table> <div> <input class="monster-block-toggle" name="toggle-ZqwmBfXf" id="toggle-ZqwmBfXf" type="checkbox" onclick="javascript:document.getElementById('block-ZqwmBfXf').scrollIntoView();"/> <div id="block-toggle-ZqwmBfXf" class="statblock-container"> <ul>   <li><strong>Immunities: </strong> necrotic and poison</li>   <li><strong>Senses: </strong> darkvision 60 ft.</li>   <li><strong>Alignment: </strong> Chaotic Evil</li>   </ul>  <hr/> <div><ul> <li><strong>Amorphous:</strong> The shadow can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.</li><li><strong>Shadow Stealth:</strong> While in dim light or darkness, the shadow can take the Hide action as a bonus action. Its stealth bonus is also improved to +6.</li><li><strong>Sunlight Weakness:</strong> While in sunlight, the shadow has disadvantage on attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws.</li> </ul></div>   <hr/> <h6>Actions</h6> <div><ul> <li><strong>Strength Drain:</strong> <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d20+4' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d20+4');"><strong><strong>+4</strong></strong></a> to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. The target dies if this reduces its Strength to 0.      <p> The trees here are dark and dripping, leaning over the murky water. He has deep blue eyes, patchy beard and a neck band (<em>Mellow</em>). <small>In the pocket: <strong>1 cp</strong>, <strong>an empty vial</strong> and <strong>a passphrase note</strong>.</small>  <ul>      <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll_ex('PBnVuNF8','RerollerQuest');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a>  <strong>Custom-fit Armor</strong> is lost (or so claimed). Bishop Galicius wants this figurehead removed lest they threaten the status quo.</blockquote> </p>  <div class="toc-subsection">  <div class="toc-column"> <h6>Regions</h6> <ul>  <li><a
